sentences.cn: “真是太过分了！”杰姬气冲冲地说。

sentences.en: a monstrous shadow on the stairs
sentences.cn: 楼梯上一个可怕的影子

sentences.en: Domestic races often have a somewhat monstrous character.
sentences.cn: 家养变种常具有畸形性的特征.

sentences.en: Drunkards had reeled by, cursing and chattering to themselves like monstrous apes.
sentences.cn: 醉汉咒骂着、踉跄地走过,并且自言自语,象一些狰狞的猿猴.

sentences.en: He felt as if it had all been a monstrous dream.
sentences.cn: 他觉得是做了一些奇怪的梦.

sentences.en: He was not to do this to her, it was monstrous.
sentences.cn: 他无权这样对待她, 这太恶毒了.

sentences.en: It was blowing a monstrous gale.
It'squirmed along the ground like some monstrous worm.
sentences.cn: 它就像一条大虫子在地上蠕动着前进.

sentences.en: Its monstrous wings seem to wheel in the leaden air around me.
sentences.cn: 它那怕人的翅膀仿佛在我周围沉重的空气中旋转.

sentences.en: Life is all moon shine, a monstrous humbug, a grand suck - in.
sentences.cn: 生活全是假象, 是可怕的欺诈, 是一场吸引人上当的大骗局.

sentences.en: Lucy is monstrous pretty, and so good - humoured and agreeable!
sentences.cn: 露西非常漂亮, 而且性情特别好,真讨人喜欢.

sentences.en: Such things were impossible. It'seemed monstrous even to think of them.
sentences.cn: 这种事情是不可能的. 光是想想都觉得荒诞不经.
那个嗜杀成性的凶手犯下了骇人听闻的罪行.
可怕的君主垄断了君主国。

sentences.en: They complain that the monstrous edifices interfere with television reception.
sentences.cn: 他们抱怨说,那些怪物般的庞大建筑,干扰了电视接收.

sentences.en: What monstrous perversion of the human spirit leads a sniper to open fire on a bus carrying children?
sentences.cn: 是何等可怕的心理扭曲会导致狙击手向载满儿童的公共汽车开火？

words.tran_cn: 怪物；巨人，巨兽；残忍的人

trans.tran_cn: 丑陋的，巨大的，畸形的，与传说中怪物相象的
